content: Anthony is a second-year doctoral student in Dr. Eliza Bliss-Moreau’s laboratory at UC Davis. His research focuses on the neurobiology of socio-affective behavior. Prior to embarking on his PhD, he previously worked as a data scientist in the health-tech world analyzing data related to fertility and oncology.
